tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (JJ Happy)) (NP-TMP (JJ Second) (NNP Sunday)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNP Advent) (NNP Church))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Happy/JJ nmod:tmod>[Sunday/NNP amod>Second/JJ] nmod:of>[Church/NNP case>of/IN compound>Advent/NNP] punct>!/.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Take) (NP (NP (NN hold)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBN found) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (NP (NNP Christ) (POS 's)) (NN incarnation)) (CC and) (NP (DT the) (NN resurrection)))))))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Take/VB dobj>[hold/NN nmod:of>[the/DT case>of/IN acl:relcl>[found/VBN nsubjpass>that/WDT auxpass>is/VBZ nmod:in>[incarnation/NN case>in/IN nmod:poss>[Christ/NNP case>'s/POS] cc>and/CC conj:and>[resurrection/NN det>the/DT]] nmod:in>resurrection/NN]]] punct>!/.]
